Field Application Scientist

Central Europe
• On-site customer training on ACD RNAscope (RNA ISH) technology
• On-site product training and validation for customers using the autostainers
Bond RX/RXm (Leica) or Ventana Discovery Ultra (Roche) 
• Training, troubleshooting and problem solving on customer sites and by

• Cooperating with industry partners in delivering ACD presentations and
trainings to their customers
• Development of network with large pharma and university hospital pathology
labs
GenMark Diagnostics
Molecular Account Executive
April 2017 - November 2017  (8 Monate)
Western Germany
• Consulted potential customers and performed strategic selling of GenMark’s
multiplex molecular diagnostic systems based on Miller Heiman sales
methodologies
• Market development and acquisition of new customers for multiplex PCR
diagnostic systems
• Developed validation plans for potential new customers
• Attended trade fairs and conferences
Luminex Corporation
  Page 1 of 4
   
Field Applications Specialist
Oktober 2013 - März 2017  (3 Jahre 6 Monate)
DACH
• On-site product training and validation as well as installations of the
proprietary multiplex diagnostic system
• Troubleshooting and problem solving on customer site and by phone
• Organization and holding of product demonstrations in cooperation with the
responsible sales colleagues
• Represented the company at trade fairs and conferences
• Joint visits with colleagues from Sales, product advice and technical
guidance
• Customer service, acquisition of new customers and forwarding of leads to
the sales representatives
• On-site product training and validations for distributor’s Applications
Specialists and customers in cooperation with the responsible sales
colleagues
• Close contact with the company’s distributors and support of distributor sales
and services
QIAGEN
5 Jahre 9 Monate
Senior Technical Service Specialist
April 2011 - September 2013  (2 Jahre 6 Monate)
Hilden, Germany
Additional tasks after promotion:
• Leader of the Womens' Health and Cellestis (QuantiFERON TB-Gold Test)
product specialist groups
• Product training for customers and employees primarily for the
QuantiFERON-TB Gold Test (IFNγ-ELISA)
• Implementation of QuantiFERON-TB Gold on automated ELISA-systems at
customer sites
• Installation of instruments and lab equipment
• Implementation of new diagnostic tests at customer sites
• On-site troubleshooting
Technical Service Specialist
Januar 2008 - März 2011  (3 Jahre 3 Monate)
Hilden, Germany
• Technical support of German and international customers by telephone and
e-mail
• Continuous updating and maintaining of technology and product knowledge
  Page 2 of 4
   
• Forwarding and utilization of customer feedback and experience
• Technical guidance at the company booth at trade fairs
• Purchase guidance and forwarding of leads to the sales representatives
• Updating and maintenance of the customer database and knowledge base
• Maintenance and administration of the online tool for product search in
cooperation with the respective product managers
• Participated in telephone training and sales training sessions
Fisher Scientific
Sales Representative Life Science
Juli 2007 - Dezember 2007  (6 Monate)
Schwerte, Germany
• Sales and purchase guidance for Invitrogen products and additional life-
science products from the Fisher Scientific portfolio in Berlin and Brandenburg
• Personal customer care and support, quotations and follow-up 
• Acquisition of new customers for life-science products and conversion of
customers from Invitrogen to Fisher Scientific distribution contrac

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
